Photo / NZME

SH23 Raglan: Man dies after struck by car while walking dog https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/sh23-raglan-man-dies-after-struck-by-car-while-walking-dog/3MKJQGVRJBHGLOII3MA4XOZNEY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/sh23-raglan-man-dies-after-struck-by-car-while-walking-dog/3MKJQGVRJBHGLOII3MA4XOZNEY/ Malisha KumarPolice are looking for vehicles of interest, a Ford Falcon and a Mazda Axela. Thu, 05 Sep 2024 02:08:44 +0000 Police have launched an investigation into the death of a man on SH23, Raglan, on Wednesday after it is believed he was struck by a moving vehicle while walking his dog.
